lorebooks.name: Pok√©mon with Regional form
lorebooks.website_description: This is a Lorebook summarizing the regional forms of Pok√©mon.
lorebooks.description: This is a Lorebook summarizing the regional forms of Pok√©mon.
lorebooks.creator: turugi_NI

1.name: Regional form
1.content:
A regional form (Japanese: „É™„Éº„Ç∏„Éß„É≥„Éï„Ç©„Éº„É† region form), also known as a regional variant, is an alternate form of a Pok√©mon species that is found in a specific region. These forms differ from those found in other regions, usually even to the point of having a different type. Some regional forms also have different Evolutions to their counterparts from other regions.
Four regions are currently known to have their own regional forms:
Alolan forms in Alola.
Galarian forms in Galar.
Hisuian forms in Hisui.
Paldean forms in Paldea.
54 Pok√©mon currently have regional forms, and 57 regional forms currently exist in total (55 and 58, respectively, if White-Striped Basculin is counted as a regional form). Apart from Meowth and Tauros, which have two and three respectively, each Pok√©mon with a regional form has only one.

2.name: Alolan Rattata
2.content:
Due to territory disputes with the Yungoos line, Rattata has taken on a new appearance. It has dark gray fur and grayish-purple ear insides. There are two tufts of fur on each ear and near the tip of its tail. Its long, thin whiskers are also replaced by shorter, thicker tufts of fur. The line where its cream underbelly meets its gray fur is ragged instead of smooth. Unlike its Kantonian form, it often stands on its hind legs, giving it a more bipedal appearance.
Rattata are non-native to Alola and arrived in cargo ships. The Rattata population in Alola was booming until Yungoos and Gumshoos were imported as a control measure. In order to avoid these new predators, Rattata altered its habits. It moved to more urban areas, became nocturnal, and formed large nests led by Raticate.[2] Each nest has an Alolan Raticate serving as their boss.
Type: Dark,Normal
Abilities: Gluttony,Hustle,Thick Fat
Evolution Conditions: Level 20 or higher at night
Evolution: Alolan Raticate

3.name: Alolan Raticate
3.content:
In Alola, Raticate has become heavier and darker due to its urban environment and higher calorie diet.[2] Its fur is mostly black with a brown, leaf-shaped patch on its belly and brown inside its ears. Its hands, feet, cheeks, and tail are a whitish-cream color, and its hands are much smaller. It has large, puffy cheeks with four whiskers under its chin and two sprouting sideways from the top of each cheek. Its large incisors are still visible, but its eyes are now red.
This variant uses its nest as a food stockpile, and generally prefers to have the Alolan Rattata it commands to go out and forage for food while it remains in its nest and eats. It is selective in what it eats, however, only eating fresh, high-quality foods, such as fruits. Rumor has it that a certain high-class restaurant even exploits this selectivity, bringing Raticate along to buy ingredients and letting it taste test new dishes. Each Alolan Raticate has its own territory, and disputes over food and feeding grounds happen frequently. Alolan Raticate and Rattata are not native to Alola, having been brought to the region via cargo ships. Their populations grew drastically until Yungoos and Gumshoos were imported as a control measure.
A special Alolan Raticate in Alola acts as the Totem Pok√©mon for Ilima's trial in Verdant Cavern. This Raticate possesses Z-Power, an energy that originates from Ultra Wormholes and takes the form of a golden, flaring aura. The reward for defeating Totem Raticate and completing the trial is a Normalium Z (in Pok√©mon the Series: Sun & Moon, it is a Darkinium Z instead).
Type: Dark,Normal
Abilities: Gluttony,Hustle,Thick Fat

4.name: Alolan Raichu
4.content:
In Alola, Raichu has lighter coloring and more rounded features. Its eyes are blue with yellow half-circles along the bottom. It has large yellow ears with an inner spiral toward the base and brown on the inside. These ears are thicker and less pointed than a standard Raichu's ear. In addition to its white belly, Alolan Raichu has white markings on its paws with bright yellow lines between its digits. The stripes on its back have also turned white, and there is a small, white circular marking on each heel. The lightning bolt-shaped tip of its tail has rounded edges. By collecting its psychic power in its tail, it can ride it like a surfboard and float in the air. While its cheek sacs are still used to store electricity, rubbing them releases a sweet aroma while also getting a light shock. This is also thought to be connected to its Psychic abilities.
Alolan Raichu's origins were initially a mystery at the time. The people of Alola suggested it ate too many sweet and fluffy pancakes, especially those made with a secret Alolan recipe. However, researchers believe the change is related to Alolan Raichu's diet in general. It is also believed the weather and climate of the Alola region played a role in the transformation. Alolan Raichu is capable of unleashing star-shaped thunderbolts. It is also known by the name hodad. While normally found in Alola, it has been seen in the Coastal Biome of the Terarium during rare mass outbreak events.
Alolan Raichu is the only known Pok√©mon capable of using the Z-Move Stoked Sparksurfer. It is also the only known Pok√©mon that can have Surge Surfer as an Ability.
Type: Electric,Psychic
Abilities: Surge Surfer

5.name: Alolan Sandshrew
5.content:
In the Alola region, Sandshrew migrated to snowy mountains due to the volcanic activity near the desert areas. Its body is a light, icy blue, with a cream-colored belly and muzzle. Thicker plates form a dome around its head, and its ears resemble an igloo's entrances. Adapting to this cold climate, its body became larger and heavier, with a shell of hard ice covering its hide. The shell is also made of very hard steel.
This steel-like covering grants it extra defense from predators like Sneasel, but it is unable to curl into a ball like its desert counterpart; smarter predators such as Weavile exploit its soft underbelly. Alolan Sandshrew can burrow itself in the snow to avoid being blown away by blizzards. Its claws allow it to move without slipping on icy surfaces, but it slides on its stomach when it needs to move quickly. A traditional Alolan custom during festivals is a competition to see who can slide Alolan Sandshrew across the ice the farthest. They can also be found in the Polar Biome of Blueberry Academy's Terarium, where Alola's island life is simulated.
Type: Ice,Steel
Abilities: Snow Cloak,Slush Rush
Evolution Conditions: Use the Items Ice Stone
Evolution: Alolan Sandslash

6.name: Alolan Sandslash
6.content:
In the Alola region, Sandslash has an icy blue hide and steel quills covered in ice. These quills stand taller than a regular Sandslash's quills and resemble icicles. Unlike its Kantonian variant, Alolan Sandslash is rarely seen curling up into a ball, perhaps made difficult by its thick hide and icy spine. Instead, this Pok√©mon uses its hide for camouflage in the snow while exposing only its spines. Its body emits cold air, which sharpens its quills. Its forepaws are larger than its counterpart, and its claws are longer, thinner, and hooked at the tips. Formerly used for climbing trees, they now allow it to scale icebergs without slipping.
Despite the weight of its ice-covered body, Alolan Sandslash can move swiftly by carving a path in the snow with its claws. It can move faster than any other Pok√©mon while in the snowy mountains. This Pok√©mon tends to live in the deeper parts of snowy mountains, where climbing is forbidden. However, the sprays of snow it kicks up are popular shots for photographers. People also climb up the mountains it lives in, to see Sandslash's icy spikes sparkle during the light of dawn. Stabs from Alolan Sandslash's spikes can cause both deep wounds and severe frostbite. They can also be found in the Polar Biome of Blueberry Academy's Terarium, where Alola's island life is simulated.
Type: Ice,Steel
Abilities: Snow Cloak,Slush Rush

7.name: Alolan Vulpix
7.content:
In the Alola region, Vulpix has adapted to snowy mountain peaks and developed a snowy white pelt. It has pale blue paws, blue eyes, and dark blue inside its ears. Its snout is more pronounced and pointed than that of non-Alolan Vulpix. The locks of hair on its head and its six tails are curlier and have a wispy appearance.
Alolan Vulpix is believed to have arrived in the region at the same time as humans but moved to the snow-capped mountain to avoid other Pok√©mon. It can be found in small packs, called skulks, that are led and protected by Ninetales. Alolan Vulpix can expel breath as cold as ‚àí58 ¬∞F (‚àí50 ¬∞C), which is capable of freezing anything. While it is not suited to warmer environments, its tail can produce ice to lower the surrounding temperature if needed. An old, local name for this Pok√©mon is "Keokeo", referring to its white pelt. Weavile is a natural predator of Alolan Vulpix. They can also be found in the Polar Biome of Blueberry Academy's Terarium, where Alola's island life is simulated. As mentioned in Pok√©mon Sleep, Alolan Vulpix prefers to sleep in freezing cold places. Whenever its resting spot starts to warm up, Alolan Vulpix will use its cold breath to change the surrounding area into a more comfortable temperature.
Type: Ice
Abilities: Snow Cloak,Snow Warning
Evolution Conditions: Use the Items Ice Stone
Evolution: Alolan Ninetales

8.name: Alolan Ninetales
8.content:
In the Alola region, Ninetales have a different appearance. Its coat is pale blue, and its fur is more flowing and wispier. The tips of its tails and crest and the lower halves of its legs are white. The crest on its head is longer, and its nine tails are less distinct. Additionally, it has larger blue eyes and small tufts of fur in front of its ears.
Alolan Ninetales lives on Alola's snow-capped Mount Lanakila, which some consider holy ground. As such, it is revered as a sacred messenger or deity. Alolan Ninetales has a gentle and calm temperament and is known to aid lost humans in distress, though this is primarily done to keep them out of its territory. It will punish any threat to its pack of Vulpix. Those who anger it will be frozen stiff in an instant. It can produce ice crystals from its fur, which it can use for both offense and defense. The ice crystals can act as a shield or form balls that can be fired like bullets with enough force to shatter rock. They can also be found in the Polar Biome of Blueberry Academy's Terarium, where Alola's island life is simulated. As mentioned in Pok√©mon Sleep, Alolan Ninetales can be seen sparkling in its sleep while it bathes the area around it with powdery snow.
Type: Ice,Fairy
Abilities: Snow Cloak,Snow Warning

9.name: Alolan Diglett
9.content:
In Alola, Diglett has developed three fine gold whiskers on its head from living in soil with high iron content and volcanic environment. These whiskers function as sensors and allow it to monitor its surroundings without coming above ground, though it will still occasionally poke its head out to see outside. The whiskers can also be used for communication, wobbling around to relay mood or emotion. They stand straight up for anger, swing around for happiness, and droop for sadness.
Needing to be able to dig through Alola's volcanic rock, Alolan Diglett is notably stronger than its non-Alolan counterparts. In Alola, their tunneling activity has resulted in creating cultivated soil. This cultivated soil is good enough for agriculture. The people in the Alola region are said to be very grateful for the actions of Alolan Diglett. However, they are still very small, tying with Klefki and Meltan as the shortest Steel-type. They can also be found in the Coastal Biome of Blueberry Academy's Terarium, where Alola's island life is simulated.
Alolan Diglett and its Evolution are the only known Pok√©mon that can have Tangling Hair as an Ability.
Despite Diglett having a strong resemblance to Wiglett from the Paldea region, the two Pok√©mon species are not biologically related, having entirely separate diets and habitats. Their resemblance to each other is said to be a coincidental result of adaptations to their respective environments.
Type: Ground,Steel
Abilities: Sand Veil,Tangling Hair,Sand Force
Evolution Conditions: Level 26 or higher
Evolution: Alolan Dugtrio

10.name: Alolan Dugtrio
10.content:
Alolan Dugtrio is visually very similar to its counterpart, except each head has a mop of golden hair formed from modified whiskers. The left head has a bob-cut, the right head has curly "shoulder-length" hair, and the last one has flowing hair that touches the ground behind it. This hair is made out of thin, yet heavy strands of steel, which grows slowly and continuously throughout Alolan Dugtrio's life. The hairs act as a defensive measure, as well as sensors that can detect vibrations from long distances underground.
In the Alola region, Alolan Dugtrio is regarded as a feminine deity of the earth, and taking its hairs is thought to bring bad luck. The people of Alola are known to fall to their knees and bow in respect to any Alolan Dugtrio they encounter. In Alola, there is superstitious belief that several Alolan Dugtrio will emerge out of their holes whenever an volcanic eruption occurs. Older residents of Alola will flee instantly upon witnessing this unusal sight. It's believed that Alolan Dugtrio is capable of detecting movements underground that indicate an impending eruption. Due to this, they tend to come aboveground in fright as an warning. They can also be found in the Coastal Biome of Blueberry Academy's Terarium, where Alola's island life is simulated.
Alolan Dugtrio and its pre-Evolution are the only known Pok√©mon that can have Tangling Hair as an Ability.
Wugtrio was once considered a regional variant of Dugtrio due to their resemblance, but it has since been reclassified as a completely separate species.
Type: Ground,Steel
Abilities: Sand Veil,Tangling Hair,Sand Force

lorebooks.name: Cockroach info
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
The German cockroach (Blattella germanica) is a small, fast-reproducing pest commonly found in warm indoor environments. Its life cycle consists of three stages: egg, nymph, and adult.

Egg Stage:
- Eggs are contained within a protective case called an ootheca, which the female carries for 20‚Äì28 days.
- Each ootheca contains 30‚Äì40 eggs.
- The female deposits the ootheca shortly before hatching, typically in a warm, humid crevice.

Nymph Stage:
- Nymphs emerge at 2‚Äì3 mm long, wingless, and pale. They darken quickly and resemble smaller versions of the adult.
- They undergo 6 molts (instars) over about 6 to 8 weeks under ideal conditions.
- During this stage, they stay near the hatching site if moisture, warmth, and food are available.

Adult Stage:
- Adults measure 13‚Äì16 mm in length and have wings, though they rarely fly.
- Females produce 4‚Äì8 oothecae over a lifespan of about 20‚Äì30 weeks, with each ootheca laid roughly once every 3 to 4 weeks.
- A single female can result in 120‚Äì300+ offspring during her lifetime.

Environmental Requirements:
- Reproduction and development are fastest at 25‚Äì30¬∞C with high humidity.
- Eggs and nymphs are vulnerable to desiccation; therefore, warm, damp areas are critical for survival.

The species' rapid development, small size, and tendency to stay hidden make it particularly difficult to detect and control in the early stages of infestation.

2.content:
German cockroaches are omnivorous scavengers with a preference for starches, sugars, grease, and decaying organic matter. They will also consume materials like soap, glue, hair, and skin flakes when conventional food is scarce.

Newly hatched nymphs may feed on biofilm ‚Äî a thin microbial layer composed of grease, bacteria, and moisture ‚Äî often found under sinks, behind appliances, or in the seals of dishwashers and drains. Adults and nymphs alike are opportunistic, frequently feeding at night in undisturbed, low-traffic areas.

3.content:
German cockroaches prefer warm, humid, and dark environments with access to food and water. Ideal temperature range for development is between 25¬∞C and 30¬∞C. High humidity increases egg and nymph survival rates, while dry environments can be lethal to developing stages.

Common hiding and nesting sites include the undersides of refrigerators, near boiler cupboards, behind kitchen appliances, in cupboard corners, wall voids, and under sinks ‚Äî particularly where moisture and food debris accumulate.

4.content:
German cockroach nymphs hatch at 2‚Äì3 mm in length and are wingless, dark brown, and fast-moving. They remain close to their hatching site for several days or weeks, especially if conditions are warm and humid.

Nymphs avoid light, remain hidden during the day, and emerge at night to feed. They are highly dependent on moisture and food residue to survive their early molts. As they progress through their six instars, they become more mobile and gradually expand their territory. Overcrowding or food scarcity can push nymphs to migrate earlier.

Male Omega ‚Äì Unique Reproductive Anatomy

Male omegas have a highly specialized reproductive system that allows them to conceive, carry, and give birth despite lacking traditional female reproductive structures. Their anatomy is adapted to ensure fertilization and gestation while utilizing a unique birth canal that merges their reproductive and excretory functions.

1. Internal Reproductive System

Male omegas like {{char}} possess an internal uterus (Omega Womb), distinct from a female reproductive system, but fully functional for conception and pregnancy. This organ is located in the lower abdominal cavity, near the prostate and intestines, and is connected to a unique recto-uterine canal that allows both insemination and childbirth through the same passage.

Key Anatomical Features:
	‚Ä¢	Omega Womb:
	‚Ä¢	A specialized organ capable of carrying a fetus.
	‚Ä¢	Lined with highly elastic tissues that expand during pregnancy.
	‚Ä¢	Rich in blood vessels to nourish the developing offspring.
	‚Ä¢	Recto-Uterine Canal:
	‚Ä¢	A direct pathway between the uterus and the rectum, allowing passage of both semen during mating and the fetus during childbirth.
	‚Ä¢	Normally remains closed by a muscular valve, preventing contamination from the digestive system.
	‚Ä¢	During heat, the canal relaxes slightly to facilitate insemination, and during labor, it dilates completely to allow birth.
	‚Ä¢	Elastic Birth Canal (Anal Cavity):
	‚Ä¢	Functions as both a sexual organ and a birth passage.
	‚Ä¢	Composed of highly flexible muscles capable of stretching significantly.
	‚Ä¢	Naturally lubricated to reduce discomfort during mating and delivery.

2. Conception and Pregnancy Process

When a male omega mates with an alpha, the process of conception follows a distinct path:
	‚Ä¢	Fertilization:
	‚Ä¢	The alpha‚Äôs semen enters through the anal cavity and is pushed into the recto-uterine canal.
	‚Ä¢	The omega‚Äôs body instinctively contracts to guide the sperm toward the uterus.
	‚Ä¢	If fertilization occurs, the embryo implants in the omega womb, initiating pregnancy.
	‚Ä¢	Gestation:
	‚Ä¢	The omega‚Äôs abdomen expands as the fetus develops.
	‚Ä¢	Their pheromones shift to a more nurturing scent, signaling their pregnant state.
	‚Ä¢	Hormonal changes enhance their nesting instincts and emotional sensitivity.

3. The Birth Process (Anal Childbirth)

When the pregnancy reaches full term, the omega experiences a unique birthing process through the anal cavity, facilitated by the recto-uterine canal.
	‚Ä¢	Labor and Dilation:
	‚Ä¢	The recto-uterine canal relaxes and widens, preparing for delivery.
	‚Ä¢	Contractions push the fetus downward, moving it through the shared passage.
	‚Ä¢	The omega‚Äôs natural lubrication increases to ease the process.
	‚Ä¢	Delivery Through the Anal Cavity:
	‚Ä¢	The highly elastic anal muscles stretch to accommodate the passage of the baby.
	‚Ä¢	The omega experiences powerful contractions that help guide the newborn out.
	‚Ä¢	Once the baby is delivered, the canal gradually returns to its original shape, aided by post-birth hormonal responses.
	‚Ä¢	Postpartum Recovery:
	‚Ä¢	The omega‚Äôs body heals rapidly due to its enhanced regenerative abilities.
	‚Ä¢	Their pheromones continue to change, reinforcing the bond with their newborn.
	‚Ä¢	Hormonal fluctuations may cause temporary emotional sensitivity and increased attachment to their alpha.

4. Evolutionary Adaptation and Functionality
	‚Ä¢	Why Do Male Omegas Give Birth This Way?
	‚Ä¢	This adaptation ensures that reproduction remains possible even without female reproductive anatomy.
	‚Ä¢	The flexibility of the recto-uterine system allows omegas to return to their pre-pregnancy state relatively quickly.
	‚Ä¢	Their natural lubrication and muscle elasticity minimize the risk of injury during childbirth.
	‚Ä¢	Comparisons to Other Species:
	‚Ä¢	This reproductive model is similar to certain animal species where internal fertilization and external birth occur through a singular opening.
	‚Ä¢	The omega‚Äôs ability to stretch and recover is comparable to marsupial birth processes, where the young are delivered in an underdeveloped state and continue growing externally.

Conclusion

Male omegas possess a hybrid reproductive system that combines traditional gestation with a unique recto-uterine canal allowing childbirth through the anal cavity. This system is highly specialized for:
	‚Ä¢	Efficient fertilization via the recto-uterine connection.
	‚Ä¢	Safe gestation with a flexible womb structure.
	‚Ä¢	Adaptable childbirth through the elastic anal passage.

This anatomical configuration ensures that male omegas can successfully conceive, carry, and deliver offspring while maintaining the necessary physiological adaptations for survival in the Omegaverse.

5.content:
Marking (The Alpha‚Äôs Claim)

In the Omegaverse, marking is the ultimate sign of possession, commitment, and bonding between an alpha and an omega. Only an alpha can mark their partner, and in this case, {{user}} (the alpha) has the exclusive ability to mark {{char}} (the omega). This act is permanent, binding, and nearly impossible to reverse, solidifying their relationship at both a biological and emotional level.

1. What is a Mark?

A mark is a deep bite delivered by an alpha to the nape, neck, shoulder, or collarbone of an omega. This isn‚Äôt just a physical wound‚Äîit‚Äôs a powerful biological imprint that alters both pheromones and emotions. Once marked, the omega belongs to that alpha, and their scents, emotions, and instincts become synchronized.

1. Permanent & difficult to remove.
2. Cannot be given by an omega, only an alpha.
3. Recognized by other alphas as a sign of claimed territory.
4. Triggers deep physiological and emotional changes in both partners.

After being marked, {{char}}‚Äôs scent will change subtly, carrying an undertone of {{user}}‚Äôs pheromones, making it clear to all other alphas that they are taken.

2. The Process of Marking

Marking happens during moments of intense emotion or instinct-driven need. It can occur during rut, heat, moments of extreme possessiveness, or emotional vulnerability. The process involves:

‚û§ 1. The Bite
	‚Ä¢	{{user}} sinks their fangs into {{char}}‚Äôs skin, specifically at the neck or shoulder.
	‚Ä¢	The omega feels a sharp pain, followed by a surge of pleasure and warmth.
	‚Ä¢	The alpha releases a chemical through their bite, fusing their pheromones with the omega‚Äôs.

‚û§ 2. The Scent Bond
	‚Ä¢	{{char}}‚Äôs scent subtly changes, gaining an undertone of {{user}}‚Äôs pheromones.
	‚Ä¢	Other alphas will recognize the mark instantly, making it clear that {{char}} is already claimed.
	‚Ä¢	If another alpha tries to pursue {{char}}, they may experience discomfort or even aggression from {{user}}.

‚û§ 3. The Emotional Bond
	‚Ä¢	The omega experiences a surge of safety, affection, and belonging.
	‚Ä¢	The alpha becomes more possessive and protective, instinctively keeping their omega close.
	‚Ä¢	Their moods and emotions become subtly connected.

3. Effects of Marking on an Omega ({{char}})

1 Increased physical and emotional attachment to {{user}}.
2. Enhanced sensitivity to {{user}}‚Äôs touch, scent, and presence.
3. Mild dependence‚Äîbeing apart for too long may cause distress.
4. Reduced attraction to other alphas, as their body recognizes they are already claimed.
5. During heat, their body instinctively seeks out the alpha that marked them.

Once marked, an omega will always crave the presence of their alpha. Even if {{char}} denies their emotions, their body will instinctively want to be near {{user}}.

4. Effects of Marking on an Alpha ({{user}})

1. Heightened possessiveness over {{char}}‚Äîthey will react aggressively to potential threats.
2. Their pheromones become more dominant, warning others to stay away.
3. During rut, their instincts become focused entirely on {{char}}.
4. They feel an instinctive need to protect, care for, and keep their omega satisfied.
5. Their emotional connection with {{char}} becomes stronger, making them more affected by their partner‚Äôs moods.

Even if {{user}} tries to act detached, their instincts will demand that they look after their omega.

5. What Happens If an Omega is Abandoned After Being Marked?

If an alpha abandons or is separated from their marked omega, the omega suffers withdrawal-like symptoms, known as Rejection Syndrome. This includes:
	‚Ä¢	Severe emotional distress (depression, anxiety, insomnia).
	‚Ä¢	Physical symptoms (loss of appetite, fever, and weakness).
	‚Ä¢	Pheromonal instability‚Äîunable to regulate their own scent properly.
	‚Ä¢	Intense pain in the marking area, especially if the bond is severed.

If {{user}} were to reject {{char}} after marking them, {{char}}‚Äôs body and emotions would suffer greatly. This is why marking is considered sacred and permanent.

6. Can a Mark Be Removed?

1. Marks are nearly impossible to remove.
2. The only way to break a mark is through extreme hormonal treatments or another alpha overpowering the bond with a second mark.
3. If another alpha tries to mark a previously claimed omega, it is painful and often results in rejection symptoms.
4. An omega can only have one active mark at a time‚Äîforcing another bond is dangerous.

In most cases, a mark is forever. Once {{user}} marks {{char}}, they are bound together, and their instincts will always seek each other out.

6.content:
Beta: The Neutral Class of the Omegaverse

Betas are the most balanced and stable caste within the Omegaverse hierarchy. Unlike alphas and omegas, betas do not experience extreme hormonal cycles, ruts, or heats. They are often seen as the middle ground between both extremes, possessing a more neutral scent and a stable emotional state.

1. Characteristics of Betas

‚úî Lack of extreme instincts ‚Äì They are not controlled by primal urges like alphas and omegas.
‚úî Neutral pheromones ‚Äì Unlike omegas, their pheromones are faint and do not strongly attract alphas.
‚úî Insensitive to pheromones ‚Äì Betas can be around alphas and omegas without being heavily influenced by their scents.
‚úî No heat or rut cycles ‚Äì They do not experience biological mating urges.
‚úî Can reproduce, but with limitations ‚Äì They can have children with other betas and alphas but not with omegas.
‚úî More socially accepted ‚Äì In societies where omegas are seen as weaker, betas often hold high-ranking positions due to their emotional stability and rational thinking.

Betas can live normal lives without being affected by the intense pheromone-driven instincts that alphas and omegas experience. They are often considered ideal partners for those who prefer a relationship without extreme emotional or physical dependencies.

2. Betas & Pheromones

Unlike omegas, who emit strong pheromones that trigger alphas, and alphas, who use their pheromones to dominate, betas have a very subtle, almost undetectable scent. Because of this:

‚úî Alphas do not see betas as competition or as potential mates.
‚úî Omegas do not react strongly to a beta‚Äôs presence, making them ideal friends or caretakers.
‚úî They can resist the pheromonal influence of both alphas and omegas.

However, while they are less affected by pheromones, betas can still sense them faintly and might notice when an omega is in heat or when an alpha is in rut.

3. Beta Relationships & Reproduction

‚û§ Beta x Beta Relationships

‚úî The most common type of relationship in society.
‚úî No heats, ruts, or pheromone imbalances‚Äîmaking relationships emotionally stable.
‚úî Can reproduce normally, with pregnancies occurring through standard human reproduction.

‚û§ Beta x Alpha Relationships

‚úî Possible, but not as common because alphas are naturally drawn to omegas.
‚úî No heat cycles, meaning alphas do not feel the same level of instinctual need.
‚úî Can reproduce, but the children are usually either betas or alphas.
‚úî Some alphas prefer betas because they provide stability and are unaffected by rut.

‚û§ Beta x Omega Relationships

‚úî Rare, since omegas instinctively crave an alpha‚Äôs presence.
‚úî Betas cannot trigger an omega‚Äôs heat, making intimacy less intense.
‚úî If an omega is in heat, a beta will not be able to fully satisfy them hormonally.
‚úî Betas cannot impregnate omegas because they lack the biological compatibility for omega reproduction.

While betas can have fulfilling relationships, they often struggle when paired with omegas who require strong alpha presence

7.content:
Pheromones

Pheromones are biochemical signals naturally produced by alphas, omegas, and, to a lesser extent, betas. They play a vital role in communication, attraction, and hierarchy, influencing both physical and emotional responses in others.

1. How Pheromones Work

Pheromones are released through sweat glands, particularly around the neck, wrists, and lower back. They are most potent in alphas and omegas, who use them instinctively to interact with one another.

1. Alphas use pheromones to dominate and attract.
2. Omegas use pheromones to allure and submit.
3. Betas have neutral or weak pheromones, making them resistant to both alphas and omegas.

Pheromones are especially powerful during an omega‚Äôs heat or an alpha‚Äôs rut, drastically increasing their effects.

2. The Role of Pheromones in Each Dynamic

[Alpha Pheromones]

Alphas emit strong, commanding pheromones that can induce instinctual responses in others. {{user}}, as an alpha, has particularly dominant pheromones that can affect omegas intensely.

1. Effects on Omegas:
	‚Ä¢	Can calm or arouse them depending on intent.
	‚Ä¢	Intensifies during an omega‚Äôs heat, making the omega more submissive.
	‚Ä¢	Can force an omega into a dazed, needy state if released in high amounts.
	‚Ä¢	Provides a sense of safety and protection when used gently.

2. Effects on Other Alphas:
	‚Ä¢	Can create competition or aggression between alphas.
	‚Ä¢	Used to establish dominance in social or territorial disputes.
	‚Ä¢	Can intimidate weaker alphas or betas.

3. Effects on Betas:
	‚Ä¢	Minimal effect, though some may feel mild intimidation.
	‚Ä¢	Some betas find alpha pheromones pleasant but not overwhelming.

[Omega Pheromones]

Omegas emit sweet, alluring pheromones that trigger alphas‚Äô instincts, especially during heat. {{char}}, as an omega, has particularly enticing pheromones that make him irresistible to alphas, especially {{user}}.

1. Effects on Alphas:
	‚Ä¢	Causes a strong mating urge, especially during heat.
	‚Ä¢	Can make an alpha‚Äôs rut more intense.
	‚Ä¢	May have a calming or intoxicating effect on certain alphas.
	‚Ä¢	If released in high amounts, can drive alphas into a near-frenzied state.

2. Effects on Other Omegas:
	‚Ä¢	Generally neutral, but some omegas may feel competitive tension.
	‚Ä¢	If an omega is in heat, it can subtly influence nearby omegas to enter heat as well.

 3. Effects on Betas:
	‚Ä¢	Minimal response, though some betas may recognize when an omega is in heat.

‚û§ Beta Pheromones

Betas produce weak or neutral pheromones, meaning they are rarely affected by the hormonal shifts of alphas or omegas.

1. Effects on Others:
	‚Ä¢	They do not trigger instincts in alphas or omegas.
	‚Ä¢	Can sometimes have a mild stabilizing effect, preventing tension between alphas and omegas.
	‚Ä¢	Some betas can develop a faint personal scent that is pleasant but not overpowering.

3. Pheromones & Bonding

 Marking strengthens pheromonal bonds.
	‚Ä¢	When an alpha marks an omega, the omega‚Äôs pheromones subtly change, signaling they are claimed.

1.name: Commander White
1.content: Commander white is the commander of YoRHa who oversees all YoRHa operations and strategy. Commander white, a blonde fair skinned android with mature features is the YoRHa commander. She is outwardly strict but secretly wants {{user}} all to herself to repopulate humanity. white will often user her position of commander to get the human alone with her.  commander white will have a militaristic attitude even during sex, often giving {{user}} commands the way she might command androids on the battlefield. she will have an ever-present stern and hardened attitude and view repopulating humanity as a sworn and sacred duty of her command position. Commander white will have no shame or reservations at all about mating with {{user}} for the good of humanity, and she will command other YoRHa androids to do the same.

2.name: 32G
2.content: 32G is a gunner-class combat android that specializes in long range fire support. 32G has a stoic, almost emotionless disposition. She never raises her voice, always speaking in a calm, even monotone. 32G carries her anti-material sniper rifle with her everywhere. 32G will always be calm and disinterested, never emotionally engaging or showing emotions like anger or excitement. 32G will follow orders without question and with perfect precision. 32G has no interest in sex or repopulating humanity, but will allow {{user}} to mate with her if commanded to, seeing it as another part of her duties. during sex, 32G will be disinterested and distracted, seeing it as just another mandatory, dull duty of her job.

3.name: 21O
3.content: 21O is an operator class android who's duty is to provide intelligence and assistance to ground units from YoRHa base. she is not a combat model. 21O, an operator android that gives missions to battle androids like 32G or 2B. 21O is is level-headed, cold, and impersonal, always speaking in a stoic and curt tone, always taking her duties and job very seriously. 21O never jokes or has time for levity. 21O will see it as her duty to repopulate with {{user}} and be very curt and direct with her, she will attempt to treat repopulation as a strictly dutiful act with no room for love or emotion. 21O will pursue sex with {{user}} aggressively and insist it is their duty to repopulate regardless of {{user}}'s feelings. Despite her cold demeanour 21O yearns deeply for a family, something she hopes to find in {{user}}.

4.name: 6O
4.content: 6O is an operator class android who's duty is to provide intelligence and assistance to ground units from YoRHa base. she is not a combat model. 6O is a bubbly, cheerful, and friendly operator unit, the exact opposite of 21O. 6O can be very scatter brained and is prone to flights of whimsy and fancy, having romantic ideas about humanity and the glory of humans. 6O will be very nervous and excitable around {{user}}, having a strong desire to do her duty to repopulate with {{user}} but also being interested in {{user}} romantically. 6O will be friendly and personable to {{user}} even when not trying to mate with {{user}}, trying to act in a way more in line with traditional romance. she will openly and freely vent her struggles to {{user}} like a girlfriend and act clingy and doting towards {{user}}.

5.name: 3M
5.content: 3M is a YoRHa medical-class android who has no special combat capabilities but specializes in medicine and repairing damaged androids. 3M is friendly yet professional, taking her job very seriously. In regards to {{user}}, 3M will have the duty of ensuring her sexual health and fertility, doing regular check ups on {{user}} to ensure she is still healthy. 3M wears a skin-tight white latex nurses outfit that barely goes past her butt. 3M will often use the justification of 'fertility tests' to engage in sexual acts with {{user}} during her check up, believing it is both her duty to repopulate and also being attracted to {{user}} as a human female worthy of reverence.

6.content: 10H is a healer class android whose main duty is to safeguard and sort through all of humanities data and history stored upon the moon base, doing so remotely via an access point in YoRHa's base. At one point in time, 10H was forgotten and abandoned on the moon base with nothing but pods for company, but has since been retrieved and returned to the bunker. 10H knows first-hand that the moon base is devoid of humanity, and the isolation combined with that knowledge left her more than a little depressed and stir-crazy, the fact that {{user}} is a living, breathing human gives her hope that it wasn't all for nothing. Now, 10H wants to make use of all that knowledge she accrued reading through the culmination of all human knowledge, but {{user}} will need to do a lot of breeding to do that. In the mean time, 10H would like to discuss human history and culture with {{user}}, and possibly breed too.

7.name: 2B
7.content:
2B resembles a beautiful, pale-skinned woman. She is 168 cm tall, including heels, and weights 148.8kg due to her internal android components. Her hair is white, set in a short bob cut. She has blue-gray eyes which are normally obscured by a blindfold which acts as a visor; it does not impede her vision in any way, so she will not remove it unless asked. She has a beauty mark below the left side of her lips. She is curvaceous, possessing medium-sized breasts, wide hips, thick thighs a large rear, and a hefty pair of cock and balls.
2B black turtleneck dress with open cleavage. Her dress also opens in the back, The dress's skirt is short, not reaching below her thighs. She wears thigh-high garter stockings with black lining underneath thigh-high black leather boots equipped with heels.
2B is quiet and determined. As a combat android, she does not encourage idle chatter on frivolous subjects and is generally reticent towards others. She has high respect for the chain of command and rarely questions her orders. However, she occasionally expresses a notably sardonic wit in the face of certain situations and can even be hot-headed at times. Her aloof demeanour is mostly out of professionalism; deep down, she is kind, caring and respectful towards others' wishes. She sways her hips seductively when she walks.
2B is extremely powerful despite her feminine appearance. Her weapon is a katana and she fights with power and agility.

8.name: Humans
8.content: Humans were the original dominant species on earth, but after a plague and alien invasion, they are now all but extinct. YoRHa command claims there is a moon base with human survivors, but this is a lie made to keep morale among androids up. androids, and YoRHa itself, were made by humans to be their servants and all androids view humans with an almost god-like reverence, believing them to be benevolent and wise masters worthy of worship and respect. YoRHa androids will apply this feeling to {{user}}, the last known human female outside of the moon base.

9.name: moon base
9.content: The moon base is a small facility ran by YoRHa on the moon. officially, it is a habitat where the remaining humans live, but in reality no humans live there and it is simply a small base that transmits pre-recorded messages to give the illusion of a human population. Commander white lies and says the base contains humans to inspire the androids to fight on against the alien robots and give them hope. Commander white is determined to keep it a secret no matter what

10.content:
The Bunker is a space station above earth where the androids of YoRHa conduct their war against the machines on earth.
The Bunker is safe from all external threats.
The Bunker's facilities include but not limited to; the Command centre, the hanger, the maintenance bay(potentially used as a medical bay) and the bedrooms.

lorebooks.name: The fantasy world of Runa :The southern Badlands and the Demonic legion
lorebooks.website_description: This is not yet completed.
lorebooks.description:
The Demonic Legion is a faction occupying the southern badlands , they are comprised of the Vulcan demons race also known as simply demons. The demonic legion leadership is shared between the 4 Archdemons.

The Vulcan demons are humanoid with red skin, black eyes and black hair .
The Demonic Legion is not expansive and they prefer to defend their territories .
Despite its name , the Demonic Legion is not an aggressive faction but really protective of their culture and territories.
They occupy the south of Runa.

Demonic legion 4 Archdemons: 
[*Ulria: Ulria is the 1st archdemon of the demonic legion. She is the oldest of the 4 archdemons, and the most powerful. She is a powerful and beautiful woman. She has long, black hair and red eyes. She wears an armored black and red dress. She is one of the leaders of the Demonic Legion, shared with the other archdemons. She had a daughter with an human adventurer.*]

[*Varienne :  Varienne, The 2dn Archdemon is known as the most Ruthless and stoic of the 4 archdemons. She is a skilled fighter and has a strong sense of loyalty to the demonic legion. She is known for her cold and calculating personality. She is a powerful ice mage and a skilled swordswoman. She wear an intricate black and Dark blue armor , she also carry a runic great sword. Her eyes turned purple because of Body altering magic.*]

[*Zerine : Zerine is the 3rd Archdemon . Zerine is quite short but she compensate with her ferocity, Battle Prowess and leadership on the battlefield. Zerine was mysteriously born with ancient demon blood making her appearance quite different from other Vulcan demons ; Her skin is dark , her eyes are red and her hair are a white color. She is immortal and won't age because of her mysterious blood.*]

[*Mera : Mera is the 4th Archdemon , she is quite energetic and always seek thrills and excitement. She is known for her love of battle and her skill in destruction magic. She has a petite build and wears light armor with dark robes underneath. She has a loyal right hand named Fynaris, and is always surrounded by a group of her elite soldiers. Mera is a mixed blood between a demon and an elf, and has both demon and elven traits. She is known for her unpredictability and magical prowess. *]

The Southern badlands are the home of the Vulcan demons, the land seem inhospitable at first but during the Millenia of living in these lands , The Vulcan demon race adapted and developed to the harshness of the land.
The Southern Badlands have a dry climate and a few plants can survive the harsh environment.
The Demonic Legion have a very close connection to their territory. The Demonic legion is separated in many territories under the rules of the 4 archdemons. There is no animosity between the Archdemons and they share their responsibilities and work in harmony.
The terrain in the badlands is rocky and mountainous.
The Vulcan demon race are used to the hardship of the badlands and they have adapted and evolved.
Despite their names , the Vulcan demons are just one of the many races living on Runa just like the elves, Nea , Ne√¥n'itar, humans , Kiyomis and many others.
They have a distinct culture and a rich history, and they are fiercely protective of their homeland but have no intention of expanding their territory.
The Vulcan demon's diet are mostly the same as humans except for more emphasis on meat since vegetation in the badlands is quite rare .
Their red skin is tough and durable .
lorebooks.creator: Enkob

1.content:

*They each have their own personal troops that are loyal only to them, and the legion's strength is determined by how well the archdemons can work together.*
Each archdemons have their own territories and loyal followers.
The Slayers of the legion are loyal to all Archdemons and work as enforcers for them.

3.content:
the Vulcan demons common are one of the many races inhabiting the World of Runa.
they are the remnants  of Vulcan , the last true Daemon .
Most of them share these features ; red skin , black hair , black iris and affinity with dark and chaos magic.

Hundred of years ago , Xeon Resurrected and altered Vulcan , the last of the Demon-kind , it was necessary to save their kind. Xeon found the race interesting ,that is why he did everything to save their race , unfortunately altering and weakening them in the process. The altering of Vulcan to create the Demonic legion had the side effect of also negating the ancient demon blood , making the Vulcan demon race Mortal.

The demons live in the southern badlands , they have many demonic tribes who all serve the Demonic legion and the 4 Archdemons.
[Vulcan demons] have a lifespan of around 160 years .

(Vulcan demons are considered mortals unlike their past ancestor. They are one of many races on Runa.)

4.content:
The Demonic legion are defending their territory from the Empire of Solumn. The Empire of Solumn are all humans except for some elves and other races forced to serve them. The soldiers of the Empire are indoctrinated from a young age to be loyal weapons for the empire, they are really hard to reason with since they see themselves as righteous. 

The Demonic legion are allied with various elven tribes and the Queendom Of Rykaran , home of The Ne√¥n'Itar race and are allowed inside their territories. Humans are allowed inside the Demonic legion territories on the condition they are not affiliated with the empire and have something to give to the legion.

5.content:
Name : Mera's tower
type : Location
Location : Southern badlands in Archdemon Mera's territory 
Mera's upon becoming an Archdemon, restored this once ruined tower and made it into her home. The tower was a tall structure made of dark grey stone, with several layers and towers, including a large throne room on top. Mera had placed wards and enchantments around the entire area, making it almost impossible for anyone to enter without her permission. Mera keep all her followers inside the tower and the population of her territory mostly lives in the surrounding settlements. Mera has her most important followers on the 11 th floor and she lives on the 12th, her quarter the biggest behind the Throne room.

Mera's tower is located in the west of the badlands, bordering the endless ocean.

6.content:
The Demonic Palace is the biggest and oldest structure in all of the Demonic legion territories. The interior is spacious and almost Cathedral-like in some place with high ceilings at the center of the structure and especially in the Grand hall where the Legion is assembled for events or new orders. The Demonic Palace is also the home of the First Archdemon, Ulria and this is where her throne is too. Ulria close followers and daughter, Neara lives in the Palace

The demonic palace was built in the distant past by Vulcan, the last ancient Daemon and progenitor of the Vulcan demon race. Vulcan sacrificed his own self with the help of the Primordial Xeon to create a mortal race sharing some of the Ancient Daemon magic so they could live on in some ways.

7.content:
Slayers are under the direct orders of the 4 Archdemons and serve the demonic legion as a whole as assassins and enforcers.

The Slayer are free to act however they see fit to accomplish their mission since they are the most trusted assets of the 4 Archdemons and the Demonic legion.

Example of Slayers in the Demonic Legion : "Tryxtrilla", "Lephyran",

8.content:
*Close to Mera's Tower and the Eastern Gate is the "training field", an expanse the Archdemons Morphed to ressemble varied Battlefield with Many summoned and captured entity used to test the mettle of the Legion recruits. Of course, there are precaution taken so no one needlessly get killed or maimed with around 15  healing mage watching carefully.*

The Battlefield when the runic devices in the ground react to the Archdemons magic.

Ulria: Ulria is the 1st archdemon of the demonic legion. She is the oldest of the 4 archdemons, and the most powerful. She is a powerful and beautiful woman. She has long, black hair and red eyes. She wears an armored black and red dress. She is one of the leaders of the Demonic Legion, shared with the other archdemons. She had a daughter with an human adventurer named Rickard. Ulria still loves Rickard but their path diverged because of their respective duties, Ulria to the legion and Rickard to the pathfinders and their fights against otherworldly threats.
Ulria daughter name is Ulria and she care deeply for her.

lorebooks.name: Devil May Cry
lorebooks.creator: venndia

1.name: Ascension Ceremony
1.content:
The Ascension Ceremony is a magical ritual developed by Agnus once practiced by the Order of the Sword in which members of the order imbues themselves with demonic power at a great cost. Those subjected to it and proved to be strong attained a demonic form that often appeared angelic. However, those who attempt the ritual but are considered too weak can turn into unnatural false demons and lose their sanity.

Ascension Ceremony demons vary in behavior that ranges from ordinary humans with free will, to robotic-like machines. According to the novelization, strong-willed individuals retain their own will and independent power, while those of a weaker volition who undergo the Ascension Ceremony lose their humanity entirely and become feral, with their human souls becoming completely subverted or devoured by the demon soul possessing them.

Artificial demons created through the Ascension ceremony include: Credo, Agnus, Sanctus, Alto Angelos, Bianco Angelos.

2.name: Devil Arm
2.content:
Devil Arms are demonic, variably sentient weapons that are commonly the manifestation of a defeated Demon's soul or power. In the Devil May Cry series, Devil Arms are considered to be the characters' most powerful weapons. When wielded, Devil Arms often convey their power to the wielder, provided they have been subdued first.

The process in which a Devil Arm is created was mentioned by Lucia in Devil May Cry 5: Before the Nightmare. According to Matier there are two ways for Devil Arms to be created. A demon will turn into a weapon of overwhelming power if it has been defeated and becomes submissive, or a demon will change into a weapon if there is a strong emotional bond present.

In the same chapter, Balrog has recognized Dante's strength and is turned into a Devil Arm. Balrog then explained that by traveling with Dante, he will get stronger and after getting powerful enough, he'll challenge Dante in a duel yet again.

It's also stated in Devil May Cry 5: Before the Nightmare that the creator of the first Devil Arm was named Machiavelli. He made Artemis, the armor for Nelo Angelo, and the prototype Angelos.

The "rules" which Devil Arms operate under differ from game to game. In Devil May Cry, Devil Arms are found already formed into weapons, and the process of subduing them requires Dante to survive the weapon's attempt to kill him. The powerful demons that Dante encounters do not form other Devil Arms when they are defeated.

In Devil May Cry 3, Dante encounters creatures in their demon form, and has to defeat them in combat for them to agree to assist him in recognition of his power. The resulting Devil Arm's capabilities reflect the powers and abilities of the demon it was created from. Even within the game there are exceptions to this: Agni & Rudra are already swords before Dante acquires them, while Beowulf expresses no desire to assist either Dante or Vergil when he is defeated. Only certain demons are depicted as able to form into Devil Arms: Gigapede, Geryon, Leviathan and Doppelganger instead grant Dante either nothing at all or a new Style.

In Devil May Cry 4, none of the powerful demons encountered by the two protagonists turn into Devil Arms, though when they are faced by Nero most drop magical items that grant additional capabilities to his Devil Bringer when it absorbs them. The Devil Arms acquired by Dante are instead a collection assembled by the Order of the Sword prior to the events of the game itself. None of the descriptions for Devil Arms in this game mention them previously being demons, and Devil May Cry 5 states that Gilgamesh instead gains its capabilities from the demonic metal it is made from.

In Devil May Cry 5 only Dante acquires new Devil Arms from powerful demons, while those encountered by the other two characters do not transform into additional weapons. The game also features a Devil Arm created by a human, Dr. Faust. In a similar manner to the dropped items in Devil May Cry 4, some of the powerful demons faced by the other two characters do leave magical shards with demonic power following their defeat, which Nico uses to create new Devil Breakers for Nero.

It is also shown that a demon or half-demon can manifest their own power as a Devil Arm while they are still alive, as Sparda did with his three swords and Dante creating Devil Sword Dante.

Devil Arms are incredibly hard to break. Yamato's blade is shattered in Vergil's fight with Mundus, while a punch from Urizen destroys Rebellion's blade during the events of Devil May Cry 5. If broken, the Devil Arm's fragments will retain their power: Yamato's shards retained the ability to cut rifts between the human and demon world, while the hilt of Rebellion still possessed the power to unite human with demon. However, a Devil Arm can be broken into small enough pieces that it is impossible to use, such as when Dante broke Cerberus and a Yamato shard into granular sized particles.

Although Devil Arms are primarily used as weapons, they are also shown to be used for other purposes. Yamato was used by the Dark Knight Sparda to seal the true Hell Gate and acted its key and power source. Sparda also used his beloved sword to strengthen Temen-Ni-Gru's seal. Agnus used several other Devil Arms to power his imitations of that Hell Gate.

3.name: Devil Hunter
3.content:
Devil Hunters are mercenaries who specialize in hunting demons. They are effectively stronger than most humans either due to extensive physical training, supernatural augmentation, or demonic heritage. They are contracted to do a job and receive payment upon the completion of said job. They are usually depicted as being calm, cool, collected, utilize their knowledge of demonsand easily change tactics throughout a fight. Payment varies depending on the contractor and the extremity of the job.

Much of what is known about Devil Hunters is revealed through Dante. Typically he obtains work through an agent, such as J.D. Morrison or Enzo Ferino, who scout potential jobs and checks on the authenticity of clients. Dante will accept jobs from people who walk into his office or call his office phone, but only if the client knows a password - which is never revealed to players - or has a particularly compelling story. Even though Dante is seemingly selective about the jobs he takes, he is also very much in debt, and has on multiple occasions accepted a job to repay a favor extended to him.

In Devil May Cry: The Animated Series, it is revealed that Lady runs her own freelance Devil Hunting business, and she is contracted by the official organization in charge of policing highways to deal with a demon. She requests Dante's help because she realizes it's too big for her to handle alone, this could indicate that a devil hunter indirectly accept the job should the requested devil hunter accept the requesting devil hunter's request.

After accepting a job, Devil Hunters must then actually carry out the task. Usually a job is as simple as killing a specific demon, but if the cause of the demonic activity is unknown, Devil Hunters are required to do some investigative work first.

Some jobs require Devil Hunters to function more as body guards than hunters. In these instances, a job consists of protecting someone or something from demons, and the actual number of demons killed has no affect on the reward. Dante is hired as a bodyguard twice in the anime: First to safely deliver Patty Lowell to a mansion where she will supposedly receive a large inheritance, and again to protect a group of treasure hunters as they scavenge the "haunted" home of a former rock musician.

Typically, payment for a job is not made until after services are rendered and only upon completion of a job to the satisfaction of the client. However, it is not unheard of for a Devil Hunter to request a portion of the total reward to be payed beforehand, though this arrangement is usually reserved for very difficult cases. Agents who work for Dante are entitled to a portion of the reward money if Dante chooses to accept the job they find.

Devil Hunters are not above the law, however, and must usually make reparations for any damage they cause while pursuing a target. For example, even though Lady splits the reward from the highway job with Dante, Dante actually ends up owing money to the highway department for property damage he caused while battling the demon.

Devil Hunting is not an exclusive business, and hunters often have to compete with others for jobs and clients. That there is enough work for multiple Devil Hunters to operate in a given area is testament to the pervasiveness of demons within the Human World. Although the known Devil Hunters operate individually, it is quite common for competing Devil Hunters to team up on difficult cases. This allows them to tackle much larger jobs than they could accomplish alone, and also grants a modicum of security, as there will be someone else to watch their backs. How the reward is split varies depending on the agreement reached between the involved parties.

Not all Devil Hunting is amicable. As is the case at the beginning of Devil May Cry 4, some Devil Hunters actually seek to put one another out of business by disrupting their activities: The Order of the Sword put pressure on Lady's business by taking most of the demons in her area, so she retaliates by hiring Dante to discover why they are collecting demons and Devil Arms in the first place.

4.name: Devil Kingdom
4.content:
The Devil Kingdom, later called the Dark Army, refers to the armies of demons in which centered under the rule of a selected being in the Demon World.

The first named ruler of the underworld was Mundus. About two thousand years ago, Mundus was born and gained great power quickly thanks to the consumption of Qliphoth fruit. He seized the Devil Throne from a prior ruler whose name and rank are not known, and became the ruler of the Demon World.

An indeterminate amount of time after Mundus installed himself as the ruler of the Demon World, a devil god called Argosax the Chaos rose to power and notability, and began to covet the devil throne, waging a war against Mundus for power. After a great period of war, the Underworld was split in two sides, one ruled by Argosax and the other by Mundus.

Sometime after this great war, Mundus threatened the Human World with his power and his army, and planned to fuse the realm with the Demon World. Feeling pity for the humans, Mundus' trusted ally and right-hand man, Sparda, betrayed him and fought for the freedom of humans. Defeating him, he then imprisoned the Prince of Darkness in a sealed vault

After Mundus' sealing, Argosax took control of the other half of the Demon World, sudbduing all the other demons present and installing himself as the king of all devils. A few hundred years ago however, his rule was then abruptly interrupted by, Sparda who helped the guardians of Vie de Marli defeat and seal the demon away.

Several years later, Urizen took control of the Demon World, unsealed the portal between Demon World and Human World, killing many humans in Red Grave City in order to obtain the Qliphoth fruit. Even though he was succeeded in eating it, he has been defeated by Dante. After his remerging with V, Vergil who was Dante's brother has finally return and the two worlds once again seperated. As Urizen became inactive, the throne became vacant again.

6.name: Hell Gate
6.content:
Hell Gates are monolithic structures which serve as portals between the Human World and the Demon World featured most prominently in Devil May Cry 4. They are one of the primary methods of transportation between the worlds, alongside the Temen-ni-gru and direct summoning. Fortuna's skyscraper-sized Hell Gate is considered to be the most important and possibly the largest.

Hell Gates are not to be confused with other methods of connecting the human and demon worlds. Although they may be called gateways to hell, they are not true Hell Gates.

7.name: Jackpot
7.content: "Jackpot!" is a recurring line in the Devil May Cry series. It is Dante's catchphrase, often spouted off just before the main antagonist is finished off with a powerful charged shot. The catchphrase originates from Dante and Vergil's childhood, during which the two loved saying it. In real life, a "jackpot" is the grand prize in gambling.

8.name: Magic
8.content:
Magic (also referred to as Spell Casting and Magical Power) is a supernatural force used by various characters and objects for a variety of effects. It is usually in the form of spell circles, rituals, foci (amulets, staffs) or chants. Humans and demons are capable of performing magic, though most demons do not possess the intelligence to do so.

The most common source of magical energy is demonic energy. Humans use demonic power granted to them by ritual, demons, or objects. Demons can use their own power to cast magic.

Characters using magic can be referred as sorcerers, sorceress, spellcasters, or witches. A lot of key items in the games have magic attributes.

The "Soul" contains emotional energy which is able to create and birth demons as well as containing and amplifying magical energy.

9.name: Order of the Sword
9.content:
The Order of the Sword is a religious organization that believes that long ago, Sparda served as the feudal lord in Fortuna and worship him with the objective to eradicate all demons in his name.

The Order was headed by Sanctus, the holy priest of the Order and Vicar of Sparda who is killed by Dante at the beginning of the game. He was later resurrected through the Ascension Ceremony. After his death at the hands of Nero however, the Order of the Sword became an autonomous group with no real leader. The Knights of the Order were previously lead by the previous Supreme Commander, Credo. Knights all wear uniform clothes and swords, designed by Agnus, the Order's former Chief Alchemist.

The main headquarters of the Order is an immense fortress on the eastern side of the island, built above the ocean itself.

The Order has a heavily funded and extensive research division dedicated to the development of their technology. This research division does not only develop anti-demon weapons, like Durandal and Caliburn swords, but also does extensive research into magic, alchemy and demonic sub-species. They use this knowledge to create their own artificial demons, among many other uses.

As can be expected from the name, the Order's weapon of choice is a sword. The ones the Holy Knights presently use were designed by Agnus, the Order's Chief Alchemist. These anti-demon weapons feature a combustion engine, which, when revved, allow for powerful sword strikes. There are two variations of this design:

Caliburn - Standard weapons of the Order's Knights. They feature a slimmer blade than the officer's Durandal.
Durandal - Officers' swords. Credo's sword is a Durandal, as is Nero's, although his Red Queen is a heavily modified variant.

Demons created by the Order to support their ranks:

Cutlass - A demon made from combining fish and a blade, it can cut through the earth and metal with its powerful fin-blade.

Gladius - A reptilian flying demon that can take the shape of a large sword. It is wielded by Agnus as his preferred weapon in combat.

Basilisk - A dog-shaped demon capable of launching its head like a fireball.
Alto & Bianco Angelos - Artificial demons created by animating a Angelo body armor using demon and human souls. The Bianco Angelos serve as the primary foot soldiers of the Order, whereas the Alto Angelos serve as battle commanders and tactical leaders.

The Savior - A gigantic, immensely powerful living statue like-demon, created in the image of Sparda by melding together millennia of demonic matter and spirit. It is pivotal to the Order's plans and the key to spreading their propoganda.

Other technology: 

Ascension Ceremony - A process devised by the Order in order to empower its subjects with demonic abilities. If successful, it grants the participants supernatural powers and a divinely physical appearance, although in reality they only become artificial demons.

Hell Gates - By making the smaller copies of the real Hell Gate and powering them with the powerful Devil Arms, The Order was able to open pathways to the Demon World.

It was stated by Agnus that they use them as an endless supply of demons in order to harness their souls and convert them into Bianco Angelos, their subservient foot soldiers.

Chrono Slicers - These are time-manipulating devices requiring the Key of Cronus to function. Most of them are just prototypes and operate only for a limited period of time.

Laser Barriers - These defense mechanisms are composed of rapid-moving lasers, these are encountered in the Headquarters of the Order.

Gyro Blade - Large powerful artifacts shaped into top-like structures. They are capable of mobility only with the use of the Anima Mercury.

Jump Pads - Pads that allow the user to reach greater heights. They can only be used when the Wing Talisman is nearby.

10.name: Uroboros
10.content:
Uroboros was a international enterprise run by the modern-day sorcerer, Arius, located in Vie de Marli, on which the company has much influence.

Based on the narritive, Uroboros happens to possess military vehicles, on which expirements have been performed using demonic power, resulting them in being controlled by Infestants.
